    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String type,
       java.lang.String filename,
       java.lang.String host,
       int port,
       java.lang.String sender,
       int ttl,
       java.util.LinkedList<PeerInfo> searchres)
        Message constructor to create a Message object to be transmitted over the network
        Parameters:
        type - type of message: CONNECT, SEARCH, SEARCHRES
        filename - name of file to search for.
        host - host of sender
        port - port of sender
        sender - username of sender
        ttl - message time to live
        searchres - list of peers that contain the searched file
